desc: 非常に巨大な獣の爪。通常の人間では剥がすことにも苦労する大きさ

dictionary.lore: The claw of a huge monster. Owing to their extreme size, blacksmiths nowadays trade in fragments of these nails rather than whole specimens. A highly valued item across Grand Gaia, Giant Claws are only found in the deepest regions of Cordelica. It is rumored that the Giants once used them to create weapons.

name: 巨獣の爪
